markers.description: BY TRINIDAD DEPT OF LAND + SURVEY 1996 (AC) ACQUIRED FROM GPS OBSERVATIONS. CONTACT LANDS AND SURVEYS DIVISION PORT OF SPAIN TRINIDAD FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION.

markers.description: BY NATIONAL GEODETIC SURVEY 1996 (AJL) THE STATION IS LOCATED NEAR THE NORTH SIDE OF THE ISLAND OF TOBAGO, IN THE VILLAGE OF CHARLOTTEVILLE.  SET IN TOP OF A CONCRETE SEAWALL, NEAR THE SOUTHEAST END OF A CONCRETE PIER.  NEAR THE NORTHEAST SIDE. OWNERSHIP--PORT AUTHORITY OF TRINIDAD AND TOBAGO.  NOTE--TIDAL BENCH MARK.  LOCATED 3.4 M (11.2 FT) NORTH-NORTHEAST OF THE PIER CENTER, 3.0 M (9.8 FT) WEST-NORTHWEST OF THE ROAD CENTER, 0.8 M (2.6 FT) SOUTHEAST OF A UTILITY POLE WITH METER BASE, AND THE STATION IS ABOUT 0.1 M (0.3 FT) ABOVE THE ROAD LEVEL AND FLUSH WITH THE SEAWALL SURFACE.  BY R.G. HAYES.
markers.setting: SET IN A RETAINING WALL OR CONCRETE LEDGE

markers.description: BY NATIONAL GEODETIC SURVEY 1996 (AJL) THE STATION IS LOCATED ON THE ISLAND OF TRINIDAD, IN PORT OF SPAIN, SET IN TOP OF A CONCRETE SEAWALL.  OWNERSHIP--PORT OF SPAIN PORT AUTHORITY.  NOTE--THIS STATION IS A TIDAL BENCH MARK.  LOCATED ABOUT 0.32 KM (0.20 MI) SOUTH OF THE HOLIDAY INN, 0.16 KM (0.10 MI) WEST OF THE (TWIN TOWERS) , 18.9 M (62.0 FT) SOUTHWEST OF THE MOST SOUTHEAST 1 OF 2 BULLARDS, 0.6 M (2.0 FT) EAST-NORTHEAST OF THE WEST-SOUTHWEST EDGE OF THE SEAWALL.  BY R.G.  HAYES
markers.setting: SET IN A MASSIVE RETAINING WALL

markers.description: BY NATIONAL GEODETIC SURVEY 1996 (AJL) THE STATION IS LOCATED ON THE ISLAND OF TRINIDAD, IN QUEENS PARK SAVANNAH, PORT OF SPAIN.  IN A LARGE PLAYING FIELD, ACROSS THE ROAD FROM THE HILTON HOTEL, ABOUT 1.6 KM (1.00 MI) NORTH OF THE (TWIN TOWERS) , APPROXIMATELY 200 M (656.2 FT) EAST-NORTHEAST OF A STONE FENCE SURROUNDING A CEMETERY.  OWNERSHIP--PORT OF SPAIN PARK AUTHORITY.  NOTE--BENCH MARK THE STATION IS A 1-INCH BRASS BOLT, SET ABOUT 4-CM BELOW THE TOP CENTER OF A 2-FOOT SQUARE CONCRETE POST, PROJECTING 15-CM ABOVE THE GROUND SURFACE.  BY R.G.  HAYES
markers.setting: SET IN TOP OF CONCRETE MONUMENT
markers.stability: MAY HOLD, BUT OF TYPE COMMONLY SUBJECT TOSURFACE MOTION

markers.description: BY NATIONAL GEODETIC SURVEY 1996 (AJL) THE STATION IS LOCATED NEAR THE SOUTHWEST END OF THE ISLAND OF TOBAGO, AT THE SEAPORT IN SCARBOROUGH, NEAR THE END OF THE COAST GUARD ROAD. THE STATION IS ADJACENT TO A CONCRETE PIER UPON WHICH THE SCARBOROUGH TIDE GUAGE IS LOCATED.  OWNERSHIP--TRINIDAD AND TOBAGO PORT AUTHORITY. NOTE--TIDAL BENCH MARK.  THE STATION IS A STEEL BULLARD, APPROXIMATELY 0.3 M (1.0 FT) IN DIAMETER, SET IN A CONCRETE SEAWALL, AND PROJECTING 0.45 M (1.48 FT) , THE DATUM POINT IS THE TOP CENTER OF THE BULLARD, THE BULLARD IS ABOUT 0.91 M (2.99 FT) FROM THE EDGE OF THE CONCRETE PIER AND IS THE ONLY ONE THERE.
markers.setting: SET IN A RETAINING WALL OR CONCRETE LEDGE
markers.stability: MAY HOLD, BUT OF TYPE COMMONLY SUBJECT TOSURFACE MOTION

markers.description: BY NATIONAL GEODETIC SURVEY 1996 (AJL) THE STATION IS LOCATED ON THE SOUTHWEST END OF THE ISLAND OF TOBAGO, AT THE CROWN POINT INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT.
